
name(Never Going Back)

snap(-10,20,10)
sky(110,197,255)
fog(252,173,116)
clouds(255,255,255,0)
ground(189,186,152,1,0.1,0.2) //ground(r,g,b,textureNum,addedHueChangeFactor,addedSatChangeFactor)
lightswingX(-10)
distfog(11700)


tip(Now it is your turn to be the police; take Sword of Justice and)
tip(hunt down the other cars; waste them all or race them)
tip(the choice is yours!) 

nlaps(3)


set(47,0,0,0)p
set(10,0,5600,0)p
set(52,350,6144,0)
set(52,-350,6144,0)pr
set(10,0,11200,0)p
set(22,0,14560,180)
set(18,0,17920,180)p
